Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) - gas turbine (GT) systems have a potential to achieve 70% efficiency, which with high fuel flexibility and high part load efficiency, makes this hybrid a promising technology for the next power generation systems.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: To realize the high efficiency and reduce the capital cost, most studies focus on high fuel utilization SOFC stack design with internal fuel reforming configuration in SOFC-GT hybrids.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: None of them have considered low fuel utilization SOFC design in the hybrid system, which could extend the SOFC lifetime and also decrease the capital cost from fuel cells, accelerating the commercialization of fuel cell technologies.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: To fill this research gap, this work examined the system performance of a pressurized natural gas hybrid SOFC-GT system with a thermally integrated fuel reforming process.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: Specifically, system cycle analysis was performed in this work to explore the feasibility of achieving high efficiencies with low SOFC fuel utilizations.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: An equilibrium reformer model and a one-dimensional SOFC model were employed to represent the SOFC system, while balance of plant model was built in Ebsilon (R) to simulate the associated performance of recuperated gas turbine cycle.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: With the thermally integrated system configuration, 70% efficiency could be reached at 50% SOFC fuel utilization with a high fuel pre-reforming rate (only similar to 5 mol% CH4 at anode inlet).
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system

Sentencas: Low fuel utilization operations with high fuel pre-reforming rates provided higher design flexibility without violating any operational constraints while maintaining a high system efficiency as compared to on-anode reforming.
Titulo: High efficiencies with low fuel utilization and thermally integrated fuel reforming in a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell gas turbine system
